src_original: taccakṣuṣmān puruṣo vyavalokayan jānīyāt-imāni śūkadhānyāni,  tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate?
iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā imameva kāyamadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ vivekāt na prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati,  paripūrayati,  pariprīṇayati,  parisphuṭayati,
tasya nāsti sarvataḥ kāyādasphuṭaṃ bhavatyaspharaṇīyaṃ yaduta adhyātmajaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena |
iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā ālokasaṃjñā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca parigṛhītā bhavati sumanasi kṛtā sudṛṣṭā supratibaddhā ca divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitaṃ samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati yathā divā tathā rātrau,

yathaivordhvaṃ tathaivādho yathaivādhastathaivordhvamiti vivṛtena cetasā aparyavanaddhena divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati  iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratibhānalābhāya saṃvartate ||
